translation.title: The Interior as Not-Self in the Three Times

next.name: The Exterior as Impermanent in the Three Times

previous.name: The Interior as Suffering in the Three Times

segments.en: 192–194. The Interior as Not-Self in the Three Times

segments.pli: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, anattā atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ … pe … jivhā anattā … pe … mano anattā atīto anāgato paccuppanno.
segments.en: “Mendicants, in the past … future … present the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are not-self …”

sections.title: “Mendicants, in the past … future … present the…
